Title: Rockstar Games: Bring GTA 3 Alpha/BETA to people.
Overview:
Oh..GTA 3..old good times...but...what happened before the release of GTA 3 in 2001? :) There is alot of people who really wants the Alpha/BETA version of this game..because it's interesting to see how the one of the best games has been developed...R* Games...we are all gamers...we are all a community..how about releasing these versions to be available at download? Im not talking to give us all the beta/alpha...but some previews with more details would be interesting .Thanks!

 

 - GTA 3 COMMUNITY :)
Letter Body: Please bring us the Alpha/BETA version of the game or at least show us what happened during the developement of one of the best video games of all time.
